Article.ArticleTitle: Consequences of COVID-19 for cancer care - a CRUK perspective.

AbstractText: We reflect on the past 10 months of clinical activity in oncology in the UK during the COVID-19 pandemic and suggest how services can be protected during subsequent waves of infection.
